Introduction

Hansol Vernon Chwe, also known for his stage name Vernon, is a South Korean-American rapper, dancer, songwriter, composer and producer under Pledis Entertainment. He is the main rapper, sub vocalist, visual, and face of the boy group SEVENTEEN. He is also a member of the group's Rap unit SVT HIPHOP Team. He made his debut on May 26, 2015 with the mini-album "17 Carat".
